markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Reaction" />command;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** A creature you can sense within 60 feet would die or be destroyed;  **Effect** You prevent the target from dying or being destroyed and restore to the target 6d8+24 Hit Points. This effect can prevent a [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effect or [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76) from slaying a target. The amount of healing granted increases to 7d8+28 if you're at least 15th level, 8d8+32 if you're at least 17th level, and 9d8+36 if you're at least 19th level.
name: command
